嶞字的基本解释

嶞
tuò
狭长的（山）：“嶞山乔岳。”

嶞字的汉语字典释义

[①]［duò］
［《廣韻》徒果切，上果，定。］
山形狭而长。

嶞字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　嶞； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页320第06
【唐韻】徒果切【集韻】杜果切，?音惰。【說文】山之墮墮者。【爾雅·釋山】巒山嶞。【註】荆州謂之巒。【詩·周頌】嶞山喬嶽。【註】山狹而長者。　又【廣韻】他果切【集韻】吐火切，?音妥。義同。

考證：〔【說文】山小而銳。〕　謹照原文改山之墮墮者。
嶞字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
嶞字的起名意思

暂无。

mountain peak
Basic explanation of words
mountain peak
tuò
Narrow and long (mountain): "Qiaoshan Qiaoyue."
mountain peak
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［duò］
["Guangyun" cut the fruit, set the fruit, set it. ]
The mountain shape is narrow and long.
mountain peak
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　嶞; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 320 Page 06
[Tang Yun] Du Guoqie [Ji Yun] Du Guoqie, sound lazy. [Said the text] The fallen of the mountain. 【Erya·Shishan】Mountain ridges. [Note] Jingzhou is called the mountain range. 【Poetry·Song of Zhou】Qiaoyue Qishan. [Note] The mountain is narrow and elderly.　[Guang Yun] He Guoqi [Ji Yun] breathes fire and cuts, and the sound is correct. The same meaning. Textual research: [[Said Wen] Shan is small and sharp. 〕 　 I would like to change the fall of the mountain according to the original text.
